channel.title: NYS:UPS on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:UPS on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: UPS Cut to Sell at BofA as Small-Package Tariffs Inflict Pain
item.description: United Parcel Service Inc. shares have been pummeled, losing more than a third of their value this year, amid an upheaval in global trade. Bank of America Corp. says its time to sell.
